context: Does the transmitter have to be plugged into USB for power? I wanted to hook up to my Samsung TV (I think the USB ports have limited output)
response: It does have to get it's power from USB however, it does not matter what USB you use (meaning you could plug it into any device/wall USB, as long as the digital audio is plugged into the correct source

context: Can you use the pro controller with this game?
response: Yes, plus we use the older Wii controllers for this as well. Some of the levels take two super heroes to pass.

context: Will it work for a PS4?
response: I never tried before, But I think it should work.

context: does the standard stealth use cherry mx brown or razer orange?
response: They use razer orange. Its proprietary, but it is just as good if not better than the standard switches.

context: Does flightstick  Pro USB 4 have it's own throttle control on the stick
response: the throttle control is on the left side of the base.

does it work as hand free
response: if you are asking do they have a mic, this particular model does not, but others do. look at the specs. i love the sound with these phones.

context: Like the WoW cata mmo gaming mouse, is the sarface of the mouse going to start rubbing away?
response: Additionally the wireless mouse never worked wirelessly. No support.  Returned it.  Would not recommend any Sterl Series product ever again.

context: can I do batting only for both sides?
response: I personally haven't tried that option but I have reason to believe you can use that option since you should be able to change teams during the innings.

context: how long and how heavy is the mouse?
response: its standard, the only difference i felt is it is a bit lower.
the game is good for children and alot of fun
Indeed it is. I run it on Windows 7 myself.

context: Can you Turn off the BackLit LED anytime or no? And does the mouse have LED as well. Can I turn that off as well. What is the warranty on this?
response: You can turn on and off the LED back light on the keyboard using the scroll lock button.  The mouse is permanently lit; no on and off button.  I'm not sure about the warranty.

context: it is Digital Game or Blu Ray?
response: It's a digital game for ps3 I don't know what they mean by blue ray. All I know is I popped it into my ps3 and it worked .

context: can you put the shifter on the left hand side
response: No, which is another reason I'd buy the better model. That one's gear box is separate so you can put it anywhere you want.

Hey Martin.  I have not tried yet.  I purchased this game before I fully realized what the requirements for it are.  I was told by a friend I needed Win95!!  Don't know if it's true, but I'll post again if I figure it out.

context: Does this have the 90degree of turning from center like the Cessna version of the yoke?
response: Without sitting in front of the yoke to measure the actual turn angle, I would say it's pretty close to a full 90 degrees. I just haven't really paid that much attention to it....

context: Will this play on Australian 3ds consoles?
response: I would say no, but it really depends on the region.
